CC Antya 7.2
জয় জয় শ্রীচৈতন্য জয় নিত্যানন্দ ।

jaya jaya śrī-caitanya jaya nityānanda
jayādvaita-can

textSnippet: to the devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu
outerHTML: to the devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu

textSnippet:
Translation
All glories to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu! All glories to Nityānanda Prabhu! All glories to Advaitacandra! And all glories to all the devotees of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu!
outerHTML:
Translation

All glories to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu! All glories to Nityānanda Prabhu! All glories to Advaitacandra! And all glories to all the devotees of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu!
